Description.p:
A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, a set of codes which represent managing finances, financial situation, financial arrangements and contingencies
Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Finances subset with subset original id 6021000000133.
The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
